contentrichtext.text: '''Darwin''' may refer to: {{TOC_right}} <!-- THESE ARE THE MOST COMMON ONES LIKELY TO BE SEARCHED FOR OR LINKED TO AS "DARWIN" ONLY: --> * [[Charles Darwin]] (1809–1882), English naturalist and writer, best known as the originator of the theory of biological evolution by natural selection * [[Darwin, Northern Territory]], a capital city in Australia ==Places== ===In Africa=== * [[Mount Darwin, Zimbabwe]] ===In Antarctica=== * [[Darwin Glacier (Antarctica)]] * [[Darwin Mountains]] ===In Asia=== * [[Darwin Bank]], oil field in Azerbaijan ===In Australia=== * [[Darwin, Northern Territory]] ** [[Darwin International Airport]] * [[Charles Darwin National Park]] * [[Charles Darwin Reserve]] * [[Charles Darwin University]] * [[Darwin River, Northern Territory]] * [[Darwin Dam (Tasmania)]] * [[Division of Darwin]], 1903-1955 election division * [[Mount Darwin (Tasmania)]] * [[Darwin, Tasmania]] ===In Europe=== * [[Natural History Museum, London#The Darwin Centre]], London * [[Darwin College, Cambridge]] * [[Darwin College, Kent]] * [[Darwin Shopping Centre]], Shrewsbury ===In North America=== * [[Darwin, California]], in Inyo County * [[Darwin, Fresno County, California]] * [[Darwin Falls]], California (waterfall) * [[Darwin Falls Wilderness]] * [[Darwin Township, Clark County, Illinois]] * [[Darwin School]], Manitoba * [[Darwin, Minnesota]] * [[Darwin, Ohio]] * [[Mount Darwin (California)]] ===In South America=== * [[Cordillera Darwin]], Tierra del Fuego * [[Darwin Channel]] * [[Darwin, Falkland Islands]] * [[Darwin Island]], Galapagos Islands * [[Darwin Sound]] * [[Mount Darwin (Andes)]], Tierra del Fuego * [[Darwin, Río Negro]], a municipality in Río Negro Province, Argentina ==In science and technology== * [[Darwin (unit)]], a unit of evolutionary change, defined by J.B.S. Haldane * [[Darwin (ESA)]], a European Space Agency project * [[Darwin Medal]] * [[RRS Charles Darwin|RRS ''Charles Darwin'']], a British ship * [[1991 Darwin]], a main-belt asteroid ==Computer software and computing== * [[Darwin (programming game)]] * [[Darwin (operating system)]], the Unix base for Apple's Mac OS X operating system * [[Darwin Streaming Server]] * [[XDarwin]] * [[Darwin Information Typing Architecture]] * ''[[Darwinbots]]'', an open source artificial life simulator == Craters == * [[Darwin (lunar crater)]] * [[Darwin (Martian crater)]], [[List_of_craters_on_Mars:_A-G#D|crater on Mars]] * [[Darwin Crater]], in Tasmania == In entertainment == * [[Darwin (film)|''Darwin'' (film)]], a 2011 documentary film * [[Darwin (seaQuest DSV)|Darwin (''seaQuest DSV'')]], a dolphin in the TV series ''seaQuest DSV'' * ''[[Darwin 4078]]'', an arcade game * [[Darwin (comics)]], a fictional character in the Marvel Comics Universe, associated with X-Men * ''[[Darwin!]]'', a 1972 musical album by Banco del Mutuo Soccorso * [[Darwin's Nightmare]], a 2004 documentary film ==Other uses== * [[Darwin (surname)]] * [[Darwin Rebellion]], a demonstration which took place in Australia in 1918 * North Australian sport: ** [[Darwin Baseball League]] ** [[Darwin Rugby League]] * [[Darwin Airline]], based in Switzerland * [[Darwin Lagrangian]] ==See also== * [[Darwen (disambiguation)]] * [[Darwinia (disambiguation)]] * [[Darwin Awards]] * [[Darwin glass]] * [[Darwin Day]] * [[Darwin-Wedgwood family]] {{disambiguation|geo}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Darwin}} [[Category:English toponyms]]
